Emerging growth company&#8194; &#9744; If an emerging growth company, indicate by check mark if the registrant has elected not to use the extended transition period for complying with any new or revised financial accounting standards provided pursuant to Section&#160;13(a) of the Exchange Act.&#8194;&#9744; &#160; &#160; &#160; Item&#8201;8.01 Other Events. On August&#160;9, 2024, Meta Platforms, Inc. (the &#8220;Company&#8221;) completed an offering of $1,000,000,000 aggregate principal amount of its 4.300% Senior Notes due 2029 (the &#8220;2029 Notes&#8221;), $1,000,000,000 aggregate principal amount of its 4.550% Senior Notes due 2031 (the &#8220;2031 Notes&#8221;), $2,500,000,000 aggregate principal amount of its 4.750% Senior Notes due 2034 (the &#8220;2034 Notes&#8221;), $3,250,000,000 aggregate principal amount of its 5.400% Senior Notes due 2054 (the &#8220;2054 Notes&#8221;) and $2,750,000,000 aggregate principal amount of its 5.550% Senior Notes due 2064 (the &#8220;2064 Notes&#8221; and, together with the 2029 Notes, 2031 Notes, 2034 Notes and 2054 Notes, the &#8220;Notes&#8221;). The offering of the Notes was made pursuant to the Company&#8217;s Registration Statement on Form S-3 (File No.&#160;333-271535), which Registration Statement relates to the offer and sale on a delayed basis from time to time of an indeterminate amount of the Company&#8217;s debt securities. Further information concerning the Notes and related matters is set forth in the Company&#8217;s Prospectus Supplement dated August&#160;7, 2024, which was filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission on August&#160;8, 2024. In connection with the issuance of the Notes, the Company entered into an Underwriting Agreement dated as of August&#160;7, 2024 (the &#8220;Underwriting Agreement&#8221;) with BofA Securities, Inc., J.P. Morgan Securities LLC and Morgan Stanley&#160;&amp; Co. LLC, as representatives (the &#8220;Representatives&#8221;) of the several underwriters listed in Schedule II to the Underwriting Agreement. The foregoing description of the Underwriting Agreement is qualified in its entirety by the terms of such agreement, a copy of which is attached hereto as Exhibit 1.1 and is incorporated by reference herein. The Notes were issued pursuant to an Indenture with U.S. Bank Trust Company, National Association, as trustee, dated as of August&#160;9, 2022 (the &#8220;Base Indenture&#8221;), as supplemented by the third supplemental indenture thereto, dated as of August&#160;9, 2024 (the &#8220;Third Supplemental Indenture&#8221; and, together with the Base Indenture, the &#8220;Indenture&#8221;). The Third Supplemental Indenture is attached hereto as Exhibit 4.1 and is incorporated by reference herein. The Base Indenture was previously incorporated by reference into the Registration Statement pursuant to Exhibit 4.1 to the Company&#8217;s Current Report on Form 8-K filed on August&#160;9, 2022. The forms of the 2029 Notes, 2031 Notes, 2034 Notes, 2054 Notes and 2064 Notes are attached hereto as Exhibits 4.2, 4.3, 4.4, 4.5 and 4.6 and are incorporated by reference herein. The above description of the Underwriting Agreement, the Indenture and the Notes does not purport to be complete and is qualified in its entirety by reference to the Underwriting Agreement, the Indenture and the forms of Notes. &#160; Item&#8201;9.01 Financial Statements and Exhibits. (d) Exhibits &#160; Exhibit No. &#160;&#160; Description &#8199;1.1 &#160;&#160; Underwriting Agreement, dated as of August&#160;7, 2024, by and among Meta Platforms, Inc. and BofA Securities, Inc., J.P. Morgan Securities LLC and Morgan Stanley&#160;&amp; Co. LLC, as representatives of the several underwriters named in Schedule II therein. &#8199;4.1 &#160;&#160; Third Supplemental Indenture, dated as of August&#160;9, 2024, by and between Meta Platforms, Inc. and U.S. Bank Trust Company, National Association, as trustee. &#8199;4.2 &#160;&#160; Form of Global Note representing the Company&#8217;s 4.300% Senior Notes due 2029 (included in Exhibit&#160;4.1). &#8199;4.3 &#160;&#160; Form of Global Note representing the Company&#8217;s 4.550% Senior Notes due 2031 (included in Exhibit&#160;4.1). &#8199;4.4 &#160;&#160; Form of Global Note representing the Company&#8217;s 4.750% Senior Notes due 2034 (included in Exhibit&#160;4.1). &#8199;4.5 &#160;&#160; Form of Global Note representing the Company&#8217;s 5.400% Senior Notes due 2054 (included in Exhibit&#160;4.1). &#8199;4.6 &#160;&#160; Form of Global Note representing the Company&#8217;s 5.550% Senior Notes due 2064 (included in Exhibit&#160;4.1). &#8199;5.1 &#160;&#160; Opinion of Davis Polk&#160;&amp; Wardwell LLP. 23.1 &#160;&#160; Consent of Davis Polk&#160;&amp; Wardwell LLP (included in Exhibit&#160;5.1). 104 &#160;&#160; Cover Page Interactive Data File (Embedded within the Inline XBRL document and included in Exhibit).
